review.reviewBody: The Margaritia and Calabria pizzas tasted great.  We ate every slice.  Got the food quickly and was hot when it got here.

Absolutely incredible pizza!
Spicy beef was off the charts. I called them with a mix up, they fixed over the phone with no hassle.
Loved the pizza and the way it was made .  Quality

I used the Create Your Own feature and ordered a medium barbecue chicken with pineapple.  It was exactly as ordered.  The homemade garlic dipping was a pleasant surprise as I was expecting a commercially prepared container.  This order was exactly what we needed tonight!
The Margherita Pizza was excellent and tasted just as I imagined. Would definitely recommend.
